trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中的原始 boolean 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a primitive byte value in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中原始 byte 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a primitive char value in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中的原始 char 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a primitive double value in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中原始 double 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a primitive float value in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中原始 float 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a primitive int value in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中的原始 int 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a primitive long value in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中的原始 long 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a primitive short value in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中的原始 short 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a primitive void value in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中原始 void 值的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to an array object and its components in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标虚拟机中阵列对象及其组件的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to an array object and its components in the target VM. Each array component is mirrored by a Value object. The array components, in aggregate, are placed in List objects instead of arrays for consistency with the rest of the API and for interoperability with other APIs.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标VM中的阵列对象及其组件的访问。每个数组组件都由 Value 对象镜像。数组组件总体上放置在 List 对象中，而不是放置在数组中，以与API的其余部分保持一致并与其他API互操作。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to functionality specific to the JDK Java Compiler, javac.
trans-unit.target: 提供对JDK Java编译器(javac)特定功能的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to syntax trees for doc comments.
trans-unit.target: 提供对文档注释的语法树的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the class of an array and the type of its components in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 提供对目标虚拟机中的数组类及其组件类型的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the content of a module.
trans-unit.target: 提供对模块内容的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides an object-model neutral API for the evaluation of XPath expressions and access to the evaluation environment.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个对象模型中立的API，用于评估XPath表达式和访问评估环境。

trans-unit.source: Provides an API for validation of XML documents.
trans-unit.target: 为XML文档的验证提供一个API。

trans-unit.source: Provides an API for validation of XML documents. Validation is the process of verifying that an XML document is an instance of a specified XML schema. An XML schema defines the content model (also called a grammar or vocabulary) that its instance documents will represent.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于验证XML文档的API。验证是验证XML文档是否为指定XML模式的实例的过程。XML模式定义了其实例文档将表示的内容模型（也称为语法或词汇表）。

trans-unit.source: Provides an easy way to collect diagnostics in a list.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一种在列表中收集诊断信息的简单方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of CallbackHandler.
trans-unit.target: 提供 CallbackHandler 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of Configuration.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Configuration 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of CallbackHandler.
trans-unit.target: 提供 CallbackHandler 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of Configuration.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Configuration 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of NotificationEmitter interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供 NotificationEmitter 接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of NotificationEmitter interface. This can be used as the super class of an MBean that sends notifications.
trans-unit.target: 提供 NotificationEmitter 接口的实现。可以将其用作发送通知的MBean的超类。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the NotificationFilter interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供 NotificationFilter 接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the NotificationFilter interface. The filtering is performed on the notification type attribute.
trans-unit.target: 提供 NotificationFilter 接口的实现。过滤是在通知类型属性上执行的。

trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to a file system and is the factory for objects to access files and other objects in the file system.
trans-unit.target: 提供文件系统的接口,是对象访问文件和文件系统中其他对象的工厂。

trans-unit.source: Provides analysis utilities for source code input.
trans-unit.target: 为源码输入提供分析工具。

trans-unit.source: Provides analysis utilities for source code input. Optional functionality that provides for a richer interactive experience. Includes completion analysis: Is the input a complete snippet of code? Do I need to prompt for more input? Would adding a semicolon make it complete? Is there more than one snippet? etc. Also includes completion suggestions, as might be used in tab-completion.
trans-unit.target: 为源码输入提供分析工具。可选功能,提供更丰富的交互体验。包括完成度分析。输入的是一个完整的代码片段吗?是否需要提示输入更多的内容?添加一个分号会不会使其完整?是否有不止一个片段? 等等。还包括完成建议,就像tab-completion中可能使用的那样。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interface for RMI distributed garbage-collection (DGC).
trans-unit.target: 为RMI分布式垃圾回收(DGC)提供类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interface for RMI distributed garbage-collection (DGC). When the RMI server returns an object to its client (caller of the remote method), it tracks the remote object's usage in the client. When there are no more references to the remote object on the client, or if the reference's ``lease'' expires and not renewed, the server garbage-collects the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 为RMI分布式垃圾回收(DGC)提供类和接口。当RMI服务器向其客户端(远程方法的调用者)返回一个对象时,它会跟踪远程对象在客户端的使用情况。当客户机上不再有对远程对象的引用,或者引用的 "lease "过期且没有更新时,服务器会对远程对象进行垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interface for drawing specialized borders around a Swing component.
trans-unit.target: 为在一个Swing组件周围绘制专门的边框提供了类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interface for drawing specialized borders around a Swing component. You can subclass these classes to create customized borders for your components instead of using the default borders provided by the look-and-feel being used.
trans-unit.target: 提供了在Swing组件周围绘制特殊边框的类和接口。你可以将这些类子类化,为你的组件创建自定义的边框,而不是使用正在使用的外观和感觉提供的默认边框。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interface relating to fonts.
trans-unit.target: 提供与字体有关的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interface relating to fonts. It contains support for representing Type 1, Type 1 Multiple Master fonts, OpenType fonts, and TrueType fonts.
trans-unit.target: 提供了与字体有关的类和接口,它包含对表示Type 1、Type 1 Multiple Master字体、OpenType字体和TrueType字体的支持。它包含了对代表Type 1、Type 1 Multiple Master字体、OpenType字体和TrueType字体的支持。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for a general printing API.
trans-unit.target: 提供通用打印API的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for a general printing API. The API includes such features as:
trans-unit.target: 为通用打印API提供类和接口。该API包括以下功能:

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for dealing with javax.swing.JTable.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于处理 javax.swing.JTable 的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for dealing with javax.swing.JTable. JTable is Swing's grid or tabular view for constructing user interfaces for tabular data structures inside an application. Use this package if you want control over how tables are constructed, updated, and rendered, as well as how data associated with the tables are viewed and managed.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于处理 javax.swing.JTable 的类和接口。 JTable 是Swing的网格或表格视图，用于为应用程序内的表格数据结构构造用户界面。如果要控制如何构造，更新和呈现表以及如何查看和管理与表关联的数据，请使用此程序包。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for dealing with javax.swing.JTree.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于处理 javax.swing.JTree 的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for dealing with javax.swing.JTree. You use these classes and interfaces if you want control over how trees are constructed, updated, and rendered, as well as how data associated with the tree nodes are viewed and managed.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于处理 javax.swing.JTree 的类和接口。如果要控制树的构造，更新和渲染方式以及与树节点关联的数据的查看和管理方式，则可以使用这些类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for handling text, dates, numbers, and messages in a manner independent of natural languages.
trans-unit.target: 提供独立于自然语言的处理文本、日期、数字和消息的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for handling text, dates, numbers, and messages in a manner independent of natural languages. This means your main application or applet can be written to be language-independent, and it can rely upon separate, dynamically-linked localized resources. This allows the flexibility of adding localizations for new localizations at any time.
trans-unit.target: 提供类和接口,以独立于自然语言的方式处理文本、日期、数字和消息。这意味着你的主应用程序或小程序可以被写成独立于语言的,它可以依靠单独的、动态链接的本地化资源。这使得您可以灵活地随时为新的本地化添加本地化资源。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for key specifications and algorithm parameter specifications.
trans-unit.target: 提供关键规格和算法参数规格的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for obtaining reflective information about classes and objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于获取类和对象的反射信息的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for obtaining reflective information about classes and objects. Reflection allows programmatic access to information about the fields, methods and constructors of loaded classes, and the use of reflected fields, methods, and constructors to operate on their underlying counterparts, within encapsulation and security restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 提供了用于获取类和对象的反射信息的类和接口。反射允许程序性地访问加载类的字段、方法和构造函数的信息,并在封装和安全限制的范围内,使用反射的字段、方法和构造函数对其底层对应物进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for obtaining reflective information about classes and objects. Reflection allows programmatic access to information about the fields, methods and constructors of loaded classes, and the use of reflected fields, methods, and constructors to operate on their underlying counterparts, within security restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 提供了用于获取类和对象的反射信息的类和接口。反射允许程序性地访问加载类的字段、方法和构造函数的信息,并在安全限制下使用反射的字段、方法和构造函数对其底层的对应物进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for parsing and managing certificates, certificate revocation lists (CRLs), and certification paths.
trans-unit.target: 提供解析和管理证书、证书撤销列表(CRL)和认证路径的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for parsing and managing certificates, certificate revocation lists (CRLs), and certification paths. It contains support for X.509 v3 certificates and X.509 v2 CRLs.
trans-unit.target: 为解析和管理证书、证书撤销列表(CRL)和认证路径提供了类和接口。它包含对 X.509 v3 证书和 X.509 v2 CRL 的支持。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for producing rendering-independent images.
trans-unit.target: 为制作独立于渲染的图像提供类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for supporting the server side of RMI.
trans-unit.target: 提供支持RMI服务器端的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for supporting the server side of RMI. A group of classes are used by the stubs and skeletons generated by the rmic stub compiler. Another group of classes implements the RMI Transport protocol and HTTP tunneling.
trans-unit.target: 提供支持 RMI 服务器端的类和接口。一组类被rmic stub编译器生成的stub和skeletons使用。另一组类实现了RMI传输协议和HTTP隧道。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for supporting the server side of RMI. One group of classes are used by the static stubs and skeletons. Another group of classes implements the RMI Transport protocol.
trans-unit.target: 提供支持 RMI 服务器端的类和接口。一组类用于静态存根和骨架。另一组类实现RMI传输协议。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for the input method framework.
trans-unit.target: 为输入法框架提供类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces for the input method framework. This package enables text editing components to receive text input through input methods. Input methods are software components that let the user enter text in ways other than simple typing on a keyboard. They are commonly used to enter Japanese, Chinese, or Korean - languages using thousands of different characters - on keyboards with far fewer keys. However, the framework also supports input methods for other languages and the use of entirely different input mechanisms, such as handwriting or speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: 为输入法框架提供类和接口。该包使文本编辑组件能够通过输入法接收文本输入。输入法是一种软件组件,它允许用户以键盘上简单输入以外的方式输入文本。它们通常用于在键盘上输入日文、中文或韩文(使用数千个不同字符的语言),而键盘上的键数要少得多。然而,该框架也支持其他语言的输入法,以及使用完全不同的输入机制,如手写或语音识别。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces relating to bean context.
trans-unit.target: 提供与Bean上下文相关的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces relating to bean context. A bean context is a container for beans and defines the execution environment for the beans it contains. There can be several beans in a single bean context, and a bean context can be nested within another bean context. This package also contains events and listener interface for beans being added and removed from a bean context.
trans-unit.target: 提供与Bean上下文相关的类和接口。一个bean上下文是bean的容器,定义了它所包含的bean的执行环境。一个bean上下文中可以有多个bean,一个bean上下文可以嵌套在另一个bean上下文中。这个包还包含了事件和监听器接口,用于在一个bean上下文中添加和删除bean。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces that deal with editable and noneditable text components.
trans-unit.target: 提供处理可编辑和不可编辑文本组件的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces that deal with editable and noneditable text components. Examples of text components are text fields and text areas, of which password fields and document editors are special instantiations. Features that are supported by this package include selection/highlighting, editing, style, and key mapping.
trans-unit.target: 提供处理可编辑和不可编辑文本组件的类和接口。文本组件的例子是文本字段和文本区域,其中密码字段和文档编辑器是特殊的实例。该包支持的功能包括选择/高亮、编辑、样式和键映射。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces that describe the types of Java Print Service attributes and how they can be collected into attribute sets.
trans-unit.target: 提供了描述Java打印服务属性类型以及如何将其收集到属性集的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces that describe the types of Java™ Print Service attributes and how they can be collected into attribute sets.
trans-unit.target: 提供描述Java™打印服务属性的类型以及如何将它们收集到属性集中的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces that describe the types of Java<sup>TM</sup> Print Service attributes and how they can be collected into attribute sets.
trans-unit.target: 提供描述Java <sup>TM</sup> Print Service属性类型以及如何将它们收集到属性集中的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for color spaces.
trans-unit.target: 提供色彩空间的类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for color spaces. It contains an implementation of a color space based on the International Color Consortium (ICC) Profile Format Specification, Version 3.4, August 15, 1997. It also contains color profiles based on the ICC Profile Format Specification.
trans-unit.target: 提供色彩空间的类。它包含一个基于国际色彩联盟(ICC)配置文件格式规范,1997年8月15日3.4版的色彩空间的实现。它还包含基于ICC Profile Format Specification的色彩配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for creating and modifying images.
trans-unit.target: 提供创建和修改图像的类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for creating and modifying images. Images are processed using a streaming framework that involves an image producer, optional image filters, and an image consumer. This framework makes it possible to progressively render an image while it is being fetched and generated. Moreover, the framework allows an application to discard the storage used by an image and to regenerate it at any time. This package provides a number of image producers, consumers, and filters that you can configure for your image processing needs.
trans-unit.target: 提供创建和修改图像的类。图像使用一个流式框架进行处理,该框架包括一个图像生产者、可选的图像过滤器和一个图像消费者。这个框架使得在获取和生成图像的同时,逐步渲染图像成为可能。此外,该框架允许应用程序丢弃图像使用的存储空间,并在任何时候重新生成图像。这个软件包提供了许多图像生产者、消费者和过滤器,你可以根据你的图像处理需求进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for networking applications.
trans-unit.target: 提供网络应用的课程。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for networking applications. These classes include factories for creating sockets. Using socket factories you can encapsulate socket creation and configuration behavior.
trans-unit.target: 为网络应用提供类。这些类包括用于创建socket的工厂。使用套接字工厂,你可以封装套接字的创建和配置行为。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for performing arbitrary-precision integer arithmetic (BigInteger) and arbitrary-precision decimal arithmetic (BigDecimal).
trans-unit.target: 提供用于执行任意精度整数算术（ BigInteger ）和任意精度十进制算术（ BigDecimal ）的类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for performing arbitrary-precision integer arithmetic (BigInteger) and arbitrary-precision decimal arithmetic (BigDecimal). BigInteger is analogous to the primitive integer types except that it provides arbitrary precision, hence operations on BigIntegers do not overflow or lose precision. In addition to standard arithmetic operations, BigInteger provides modular arithmetic, GCD calculation, primality testing, prime generation, bit manipulation, and a few other miscellaneous operations. BigDecimal provides arbitrary-precision signed decimal numbers suitable for currency calculations and the like. BigDecimal gives the user complete control over rounding behavior, allowing the user to choose from a comprehensive set of eight rounding modes.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于执行任意精度整数算术（ BigInteger ）和任意精度十进制算术（ BigDecimal ）的类。 BigInteger 与原始整数类型类似，不同之处在于它提供任意精度，因此 BigInteger 上的操作不会溢出或丢失精度。除标准算术运算外， BigInteger 还提供了模块化算术，GCD计算，素数测试，素数生成，位操作和其他一些其他运算。 BigDecimal 提供适用于货币计算等的任意精度的带符号十进制数字。 BigDecimal 为用户提供了对舍入行为的完全控制，允许用户从八种舍入模式的全面选择中进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for performing arbitrary-precision integer arithmetic (BigInteger) and arbitrary-precision decimal arithmetic (BigDecimal). BigInteger is analogous to the primitive integer types except that it provides arbitrary precision, hence operations on BigIntegers do not overflow or lose precision. In addition to standard arithmetic operations, BigInteger provides modular arithmetic, GCD calculation, primality testing, prime generation, bit manipulation, and a few other miscellaneous operations. BigDecimal provides arbitrary-precision signed decimal numbers suitable for currency calculations and the like. BigDecimal gives the user complete control over rounding behavior, allowing the user to choose from a comprehensive set of eight rounding modes.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于执行任意精度整数算术（ BigInteger ）和任意精度十进制算术（ BigDecimal ）的类。 BigInteger 与原始整数类型类似，不同之处在于它提供任意精度，因此 BigInteger 上的操作不会溢出或丢失精度。除标准算术运算外， BigInteger 还提供模块化算术，GCD计算，素数测试，素数生成，位操作和其他一些杂项运算。 BigDecimal 提供适用于货币计算等的任意精度带符号十进制数。 BigDecimal 为用户提供了对舍入行为的完全控制，使用户可以从八种舍入模式的全面集合中进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for public key certificates.
trans-unit.target: 为公钥证书提供类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for public key certificates. The classes in this package have been deprecated. New classes should not be added to this package. These classes include a simplified version of the java.security.cert package. These classes were developed as part of the Java Secure Socket Extension (JSSE). When JSSE was added to the J2SE version 1.4, this package was added for backward-compatibility reasons only. New applications should not use this package, but rather java.security.cert.
trans-unit.target: 提供公共密钥证书的类。此软件包中的类已被弃用。新类不应添加到此程序包中。这些类包括 java.security.cert 软件包的简化版本。这些类是作为Java安全套接字扩展（JSSE）的一部分开发的。将JSSE添加到J2SE版本1.4中时，仅出于向后兼容的原因添加了此软件包。新应用程序不应使用此包，而应使用 java.security.cert 。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for public key certificates. These classes include a simplified version of the java.security.cert package. These classes were developed as part of the Java Secure Socket Extension (JSSE). When JSSE was added to the J2SE version 1.4, this package was added for backward-compatibility reasons only. New applications should not use this package, but rather java.security.cert.
trans-unit.target: 为公钥证书提供了类,这些类包括简化版的java.security.cert包。这些类包括一个简化版的java.security.cert包。这些类是作为Java安全套接字扩展(JSSE)的一部分开发的。当JSSE被添加到J2SE的1.4版本中时,添加这个包只是为了向后兼容。新的应用程序不应该使用这个包,而应该使用 java.security.cert。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for reading and writing the JAR (Java ARchive) file format, which is based on the standard ZIP file format with an optional manifest file.
trans-unit.target: 提供读写JAR(Java ARchive)文件格式的类,它基于标准的ZIP文件格式,有一个可选的清单文件。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for reading and writing the JAR (Java ARchive) file format, which is based on the standard ZIP file format with an optional manifest file. The manifest stores meta-information about the JAR file contents and is also used for signing JAR files.
trans-unit.target: 提供读写JAR(Java ARchive)文件格式的类,它基于标准的ZIP文件格式,并带有一个可选的manifest文件。manifest存储了JAR文件内容的元信息,也用于签署JAR文件。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for reading and writing the standard ZIP and GZIP file formats.
trans-unit.target: 提供标准ZIP和GZIP文件格式的读写类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for reading and writing the standard ZIP and GZIP file formats. Also includes classes for compressing and decompressing data using the DEFLATE compression algorithm, which is used by the ZIP and GZIP file formats. Additionally, there are utility classes for computing the CRC-32 and Adler-32 checksums of arbitrary input streams.
trans-unit.target: 提供了读写标准ZIP和GZIP文件格式的类,还包括使用ZIP和GZIP文件格式所使用的DEFLATE压缩算法压缩和解压数据的类。还包括使用ZIP和GZIP文件格式使用的DEFLATE压缩算法压缩和解压数据的类。此外,还有用于计算任意输入流的CRC-32和Adler-32校验和的实用类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for reading and writing the standard ZIP and GZIP file formats. Also includes classes for compressing and decompressing data using the DEFLATE compression algorithm, which is used by the ZIP and GZIP file formats. Additionally, there are utility classes for computing the CRC-32, CRC-32C and Adler-32 checksums of arbitrary input streams.
trans-unit.target: 提供了读写标准ZIP和GZIP文件格式的类,还包括使用ZIP和GZIP文件格式所使用的DEFLATE压缩算法压缩和解压数据的类。还包括使用ZIP和GZIP文件格式使用的DEFLATE压缩算法压缩和解压数据的类。此外,还有用于计算任意输入流的CRC-32、CRC-32C和Adler-32校验和的实用类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for the secure socket package.
trans-unit.target: 为安全套接字包提供类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes for the secure socket package. Using the secure socket classes, you can communicate using SSL or a related security protocol to reliably detect any errors introduced into the network byte stream and to optionally encrypt the data and/or authenticate the communicating peers.
trans-unit.target: 为安全套接字包提供类。使用安全套接字类,你可以使用SSL或相关的安全协议进行通信,以可靠地检测引入网络字节流的任何错误,并有选择地对数据进行加密和/或验证通信对等体。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes that are fundamental to the design of the Java programming language.
trans-unit.target: 提供了Java编程语言设计的基础类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes that are fundamental to the design of the Java programming language. The most important classes are Object, which is the root of the class hierarchy, and Class, instances of which represent classes at run time.
trans-unit.target: 提供对Java编程语言的设计至关重要的类。最重要的类是 Object ，它是类层次结构的根，而 Class 的实例代表运行时的类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes that are fundamental to the design of the Java programming language. The most important classes are Object, which is the root of the class hierarchy, and Class, instances of which represent classes at run time.
trans-unit.target: 提供对Java编程语言的设计至关重要的类。最重要的类是 Object ，它是类层次结构的根，而 Class 的实例代表运行时的类。

trans-unit.source: Provides classes to print and parse dates and times.
trans-unit.target: 提供打印和解析日期和时间的类。

trans-unit.source: Provides default implementations of ExecutorService execution methods.
trans-unit.target: 提供 ExecutorService 执行方法的默认实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides default implementations of ExecutorService execution methods. This class implements the submit, invokeAny and invokeAll methods using a RunnableFuture returned by newTaskFor, which defaults to the FutureTask class provided in this package. For example, the implementation of submit(Runnable) creates an associated RunnableFuture that is executed and returned. Subclasses may override the newTaskFor methods to return RunnableFuture implementations other than FutureTask.
trans-unit.target: 提供 ExecutorService 执行方法的默认实现。此类实现 submit ， invokeAny 和 invokeAll 使用方法 RunnableFuture 通过返回 newTaskFor ，其默认为 FutureTask 类此包中提供。例如， submit(Runnable) 的实现创建一个关联的 RunnableFuture ，该RunnableFuture将被执行并返回。子类可以重写 newTaskFor 方法，以返回 FutureTask 以外的 RunnableFuture 实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides definitions of the attribute change notifications sent by MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 提供MBeans发送的属性变化通知的定义。

trans-unit.source: Provides definitions of the notifications sent by monitor MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 提供监控MBeans发送的通知的定义。

trans-unit.source: Provides details about work that has been done by the JDK Java Compiler, javac.
trans-unit.target: 提供JDK Java编译器javac所做工作的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides fields for storing of stream instances in addition to providing a set of constants for stream type designation.
trans-unit.target: 除了提供一组用于流类型指定的常量外,还提供了用于存储流实例的字段。

trans-unit.source: Provides for events fired by Swing components.
trans-unit.target: 提供由Swing组件引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: Provides for events fired by Swing components. It contains event classes and corresponding event listener interfaces for events fired by Swing components in addition to those events in the java.awt.event package.
trans-unit.target: 提供由Swing组件触发的事件。除了 java.awt.event 包中的事件，它还包含事件类和Swing组件触发的事件的相应事件侦听器接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.
trans-unit.target: 通过数据流、序列化和文件系统提供系统输入和输出。

trans-unit.source: Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system. Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in any class or interface in this package will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 通过数据流，序列化和文件系统提供系统输入和输出。除非另有说明，否则将null参数传递给此程序包中任何类或接口中的构造函数或方法都将引发 NullPointerException 。

trans-unit.source: Provides general information for an MBean descriptor object.
trans-unit.target: 提供MBean描述符对象的一般信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides general information for an MBean descriptor object. The feature described can be an attribute, an operation, a parameter, or a notification. Instances of this class are immutable. Subclasses may be mutable but this is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 提供MBean描述符对象的一般信息。所描述的特征可以是一个属性、一个操作、一个参数或一个通知。该类的实例是不可变的。子类可以是可突变的,但不建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: Provides helper classes, including support for bootstrapping SAX-based applications.
trans-unit.target: 提供帮助类,包括支持基于SAX的应用程序的引导。

trans-unit.source: Provides high-level client interfaces to HTTP (versions 1.1 and 2) and low-level client interfaces to WebSocket. The main types defined are:
trans-unit.target: 提供HTTP(1.1和2版本)的高级客户端接口和WebSocket的低级客户端接口。定义的主要类型有:

trans-unit.source: Provides implementation support for building JShell execution engines.
trans-unit.target: 为构建JShell执行引擎提供实施支持。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementation support for building JShell execution engines. Includes concrete and abstract implementations of the ExecutionControl interface. Also, provides related communication utilities. This package may be used to define alternative execution engines. The default JShell execution engine is included.
trans-unit.target: 为构建JShell执行引擎提供实施支持。包括 ExecutionControl 接口的具体和抽象实现。此外，还提供了相关的通讯实用程序。该包可用于定义替代的执行引擎。包含默认的JShell执行引擎。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations for the methods that set and get metadata information about a RowSet object's columns.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于设置和获取有关 RowSet 对象的列的元数据信息的方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations for the methods that set and get metadata information about a RowSet object's columns. A RowSetMetaDataImpl object keeps track of the number of columns in the rowset and maintains an internal array of column attributes for each column.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于设置和获取有关 RowSet 对象的列的元数据信息的方法的实现。甲 RowSetMetaDataImpl 对象跟踪行集中的列数的和维护用于每个列的列属性的内部阵列。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of LoginModule.
trans-unit.target: 提供 LoginModule 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of Principal.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Principal 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of RMIClientSocketFactory and RMIServerSocketFactory over the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
trans-unit.target: 通过安全套接字层（SSL）或传输层安全性（TLS）协议提供 RMIClientSocketFactory 和 RMIServerSocketFactory 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of Principal.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Principal 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of LoginModule.
trans-unit.target: 提供 LoginModule 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of RMIClientSocketFactory and RMIServerSocketFactory over the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
trans-unit.target: 通过安全套接字层（SSL）或传输层安全性（TLS）协议提供 RMIClientSocketFactory 和 RMIServerSocketFactory 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of a service.
trans-unit.target: 提供服务的实施。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of a service. The package for each provider (or provider factory) is added to the module if not already added.
trans-unit.target: 提供服务的实现。如果还没有添加,则将每个提供者(或提供者工厂)的包添加到模块中。

trans-unit.source: Provides implementations of the javax.security.auth.* interfaces and various authentication modules.
trans-unit.target: 提供 javax.security.auth.* 接口和各种身份验证模块的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides information on the accessibility of a type or type component.
trans-unit.target: 提供类型或类型组件的可访问性信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides information on the accessibility of a type or type component. Mirrors for program elements which allow an an access specifier (private, protected, public) provide information on that part of the declaration through this interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供关于类型或类型组件的可访问性信息。允许访问指定器(private、protected、public)的程序元素的镜像通过这个接口提供关于声明部分的信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides information on the location of an event.
trans-unit.target: 提供活动地点的信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides information on the location of an event. All the information provided by a Location is optional. For example an application may only report line numbers.
trans-unit.target: 提供事件的地点信息。地点提供的所有信息都是可选的。例如,应用程序可能只报告行号。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces and classes for I/O, sequencing, and synthesis of MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) data.
trans-unit.target: 提供MIDI(Musical Instrument Digital Interface)数据的I/O、排序和合成的接口和类。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces and classes for capture, processing, and playback of sampled audio data.
trans-unit.target: 为采样音频数据的采集、处理和回放提供接口和类。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with different types of events fired by AWT components.
trans-unit.target: 提供接口和类,用于处理AWT组件触发的不同类型的事件。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with different types of events fired by AWT components. See the java.awt.AWTEvent class for details on the AWT event model. Events are fired by event sources. An event listener registers with an event source to receive notifications about the events of a particular type. This package defines events and event listeners, as well as event listener adapters, which are convenience classes to make easier the process of writing event listeners.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于处理由AWT组件触发的不同类型事件的接口和类。有关AWT事件模型的详细信息，请参见 java.awt.AWTEvent 类。事件由事件源触发。事件侦听器向事件源注册，以接收有关特定类型事件的通知。该软件包定义了事件和事件侦听器以及事件侦听器适配器，它们是方便类，可以简化编写事件侦听器的过程。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces and classes for interaction with various desktop capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 为各种桌面功能的交互提供接口和类。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces and classes for transferring data between and within applications.
trans-unit.target: 为应用程序之间和应用程序内部的数据传输提供接口和类。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces and classes for transferring data between and within applications. It defines the notion of a "transferable" object, which is an object capable of being transferred between or within applications. An object identifies itself as being transferable by implementing the Transferable interface.
trans-unit.target: 为应用程序之间和应用程序内部的数据传输提供接口和类。它定义了 "可转移 "对象的概念,即能够在应用程序之间或应用程序内部转移的对象。对象通过实现可转移接口来表明自己是可转移的。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Events.
trans-unit.target: 为DOM 2级事件提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Events. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Events Specification , the DOM Events module builds on DOM Level 2 Core Specification and DOM Level 2 Views Specification that gives to programs and scripts a generic event system.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM 2级事件的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）2级事件规范，“ DOM事件”模块以DOM 2级核心规范和DOM 2级视图规范为基础，该规范为程序和脚本提供了通用事件系统。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Events. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Events Specification , the DOM Events module builds on DOM Level 2 Core Specification and DOM Level 2 Views Specification that gives to programs and scripts a generic event system.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM 2级事件的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）2级事件规范，“ DOM事件”模块以DOM 2级核心规范和DOM 2级视图规范为基础，该规范为程序和脚本提供了通用事件系统。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 HTML Specification.
trans-unit.target: 为DOM Level 2 HTML规范提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 HTML Specification. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Specification, the HTML module extends the Core API to describe objects and methods specific to HTML documents that comply with HTML 4.0 Specification.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别2 HTML规范的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）2级规范，HTML模块扩展了Core API，以描述特定于符合HTML 4.0规范的HTML文档的对象和方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Range.
trans-unit.target: 为DOM Level 2 Range提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Range. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Traversal and Range Specification, the Range module defines specialized interfaces for identifying and manipulating a range in a document.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别2范围的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）级别2遍历和范围规范，范围模块定义用于识别和处理文档中范围的专用接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Range. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Traversal and Range Specification, the Range module defines specialized interfaces for identifying and manipulating a range in a document.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别2范围的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）级别2遍历和范围规范，范围模块定义用于识别和处理文档中范围的专用接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Style Specification.
trans-unit.target: 为DOM Level 2 Style Specification提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Style Specification. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification, the CSS and stylesheets modules define the Document Object Model Level 2 Style Sheets and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) that allow programs and scripts to dynamically access and update the content of style sheets documents.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别2样式规范的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）2级样式规范，CSS和样式表模块定义文档对象模型2级样式表和级联样式表（CSS），这些样式表和级联样式表（CSS）允许程序和脚本动态访问和更新样式表的内容文件。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Traversal.
trans-unit.target: 为DOM二级遍历提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Traversal. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Traversal and Range Specification, the Traversal module contains specialized interfaces dedicated to traversing the document structure.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别2遍历的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）2级遍历和范围规范，遍历模块包含专用于遍历文档结构的专用接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Traversal. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Traversal and Range Specification, the Traversal module contains specialized interfaces dedicated to traversing the document structure.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别2遍历的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）2级遍历和范围规范，遍历模块包含专用于遍历文档结构的专用接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Views.
trans-unit.target: 为DOM二级视图提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Views. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Views Specification, the Views module allows programs and scripts to dynamically access and update the content of a representation of a document.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别2视图的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）级别2视图规范，“视图”模块允许程序和脚本动态访问和更新文档表示的内容。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Views. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Views Specification, the Views module allows programs and scripts to dynamically access and update the content of a representation of a document.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别2视图的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）级别2视图规范，“视图”模块允许程序和脚本动态访问和更新文档表示的内容。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 3 Load and Save.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM第三级加载和保存的接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 3 Load and Save. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Load and Save Specification, the Load and Save interface allows programs and scripts to dynamically load the content of an XML document into a DOM document and serialize a DOM document into an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别3加载和保存的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）级别3加载和保存规范，加载和保存接口允许程序和脚本将XML文档的内容动态加载到DOM文档中，并将DOM文档序列化为XML文档。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 3 Load and Save. Refer to the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Load and Save Specification, the Load and Save interface allows programs and scripts to dynamically load the content of an XML document into a DOM document and serialize a DOM document into an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别3加载和保存的接口。请参阅文档对象模型（DOM）级别3加载和保存规范，加载和保存接口允许程序和脚本将XML文档的内容动态加载到DOM文档中，并将DOM文档序列化为XML文档。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 3 XPath Specification.
trans-unit.target: 为DOM Level 3 XPath Specification提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 3 XPath Specification. The XPath module provides simple functionalities to access a DOM tree using XPath 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 提供DOM级别3 XPath规范的接口。XPath模块提供了使用XPath 1.0访问DOM树的简单功能。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for Diffie-Hellman keys as defined in RSA Laboratories' PKCS #3.
trans-unit.target: 为RSA实验室的PKCS #3中定义的Diffie-Hellman密钥提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for creating tools, such as a Read-Eval-Print Loop (REPL), which interactively evaluate "snippets" of Java programming language code.
trans-unit.target: 提供了创建工具的接口,如读取-评价-打印循环(REPL),它可以交互式地评估Java编程语言代码的 "片段"。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for creating tools, such as a Read-Eval-Print Loop (REPL), which interactively evaluate "snippets" of Java programming language code. Where a "snippet" is a single expression, statement, or declaration. This functionality can be used to enhance tools such as IDEs or can be stand-alone.
trans-unit.target: 提供了用于创建工具的接口,如Read-Eval-Print Loop (REPL),它可以交互式地评估Java编程语言代码的 "片段"。其中 "片段 "是一个单一的表达式、语句或声明。这个功能可以用来增强IDE等工具,也可以是独立的。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for generating RSA (Rivest, Shamir and Adleman AsymmetricCipher algorithm) keys as defined in the RSA Laboratory Technical Note PKCS#1, and DSA (Digital Signature Algorithm) keys as defined in NIST's FIPS-186.
trans-unit.target: 提供接口,用于生成RSA(Rivest,Shamir和Adleman AsymmetricCipher算法)密钥,如RSA实验室技术说明PKCS#1所定义,以及DSA(数字签名算法)密钥,如NIST的FIPS-186所定义。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces for tools which can be invoked from a program, for example, compilers.
trans-unit.target: 为可以从程序中调用的工具提供接口,例如,编译器。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces that enable the development of input methods that can be used with any Java runtime environment.
trans-unit.target: 提供了能够开发可用于任何Java运行时环境的输入方法的接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces that enable the development of input methods that can be used with any Java runtime environment. Input methods are software components that let the user enter text in ways other than simple typing on a keyboard. They are commonly used to enter Japanese, Chinese, or Korean - languages using thousands of different characters - on keyboards with far fewer keys. However, this package also allows the development of input methods for other languages and the use of entirely different input mechanisms, such as handwriting recognition.
trans-unit.target: 提供接口,使其能够开发可用于任何Java运行时环境的输入方法。输入法是一种软件组件,它允许用户以键盘上简单输入以外的方式输入文本。它们通常用于在键盘上输入日语、中文或韩语--这些语言使用数千个不同的字符--而键盘上的按键却少得可怜。然而,这个软件包也允许开发其他语言的输入法,以及使用完全不同的输入机制,如手写识别。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces to SAX2 facilities that conformant SAX drivers won't necessarily support.
trans-unit.target: 提供符合SAX驱动不一定支持的SAX2设施的接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces to represent documentation comments as abstract syntax trees (AST).
trans-unit.target: 提供接口以抽象语法树(AST)的形式来表示文档注释。

trans-unit.source: Provides interfaces to represent source code as abstract syntax trees (AST).
trans-unit.target: 提供接口以抽象语法树(AST)的形式来表示源代码。

trans-unit.source: Provides library support for the Java programming language annotation facility.
trans-unit.target: 为Java编程语言注释设施提供库支持。

trans-unit.source: Provides means to configure, start, stop and dump recording data to disk.
trans-unit.target: 提供配置、启动、停止和向磁盘转储记录数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods for locating tool providers, for example, providers of compilers.
trans-unit.target: 提供定位工具提供者的方法,例如,编译器的提供者。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods for locating tool providers, for example, providers of compilers. This class complements the functionality of ServiceLoader.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于定位工具提供者（例如，编译器的提供者）的方法。此类补充了 ServiceLoader 的功能。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods for locating tool providers, for example, providers of compilers. This class complements the functionality of ServiceLoader.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于定位工具提供者（例如，编译器的提供者）的方法。此类补充了 ServiceLoader 的功能。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods that input methods can use to communicate with their client components or to request other services.
trans-unit.target: 提供了输入方法可以用来与它们的客户端组件通信或请求其他服务的方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods that input methods can use to communicate with their client components or to request other services. This interface is implemented by the input method framework, and input methods call its methods on the instance they receive through InputMethod.setInputMethodContext(java.awt.im.spi.InputMethodContext). There should be no other implementors or callers.
trans-unit.target: 提供输入法可用于与其客户端组件进行通信或请求其他服务的方法。此接口由输入法框架实现，输入法在通过 InputMethod.setInputMethodContext(java.awt.im.spi.InputMethodContext) 接收到的实例上调用其方法。不应有其他实现者或调用者。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to control text input facilities such as input methods and keyboard layouts.
trans-unit.target: 提供了控制文本输入设施的方法,如输入法和键盘布局。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to control text input facilities such as input methods and keyboard layouts. Two methods handle both input methods and keyboard layouts: selectInputMethod lets a client component select an input method or keyboard layout by locale, getLocale lets a client component obtain the locale of the current input method or keyboard layout. The other methods more specifically support interaction with input methods: They let client components control the behavior of input methods, and dispatch events from the client component to the input method.
trans-unit.target: 提供了控制文本输入设施的方法,如输入法和键盘布局。有两个方法可以同时处理输入法和键盘布局:selectInputMethod可以让客户组件通过locale选择一个输入法或键盘布局,getLocale可以让客户组件获得当前输入法或键盘布局的locale。其他方法更具体地支持与输入法的交互。它们让客户端组件控制输入法的行为,并从客户端组件向输入法派遣事件。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to convert between character positions and line numbers for a compilation unit.
trans-unit.target: 提供编译单元的字符位置和行号之间的转换方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to convert internationalized domain names (IDNs) between a normal Unicode representation and an ASCII Compatible Encoding (ACE) representation.
trans-unit.target: 提供了在普通Unicode表示和ASCII兼容编码(ACE)表示之间转换国际化域名(IDNs)的方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to convert internationalized domain names (IDNs) between a normal Unicode representation and an ASCII Compatible Encoding (ACE) representation. Internationalized domain names can use characters from the entire range of Unicode, while traditional domain names are restricted to ASCII characters. ACE is an encoding of Unicode strings that uses only ASCII characters and can be used with software (such as the Domain Name System) that only understands traditional domain names.
trans-unit.target: 提供了在普通Unicode表示和ASCII兼容编码(ACE)表示之间转换国际化域名(IDN)的方法。国际化域名可以使用整个Unicode范围内的字符,而传统域名只能使用ASCII字符。ACE是一种只使用ASCII字符的Unicode字符串编码,可以与只理解传统域名的软件(如域名系统)一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to obtain the position of a DocTree within a javadoc comment.
trans-unit.target: 提供在javadoc注释中获取DocTree位置的方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to obtain the position of a DocTree within a javadoc comment. A position is defined as a simple character offset from the start of a CompilationUnit where the first character is at offset 0.
trans-unit.target: 提供了获取javadoc注释中DocTree位置的方法。位置被定义为一个简单的字符偏移量,从编译单元的开始,第一个字符在偏移量0处。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to obtain the position of a Tree within a CompilationUnit.
trans-unit.target: 提供了获取编译单元中树的位置的方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides methods to obtain the position of a Tree within a CompilationUnit. A position is defined as a simple character offset from the start of a CompilationUnit where the first character is at offset 0.
trans-unit.target: 提供了获取编译单元中树的位置的方法。位置被定义为一个简单的字符偏移量,从一个编译单元的开始,第一个字符在偏移量0处。

trans-unit.source: Provides one interface and many abstract classes that Swing uses to provide its pluggable look-and-feel capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一个接口和许多抽象类,Swing使用这些抽象类来提供其可插拔的外观和感觉功能。

trans-unit.source: Provides one interface and many abstract classes that Swing uses to provide its pluggable look-and-feel capabilities. Its classes are subclassed and implemented by look and feel UIs such as Basic and the Java look and feel (Metal). This package is only used by developers who cannot create a new look and feel by subclassing existing look-and-feel components (such as those provided by the javax.swing.plaf.basic and javax.swing.plaf.metal packages).
trans-unit.target: 提供一个接口和许多抽象类，Swing使用这些接口来提供其可插入的外观功能。它的类通过外观UI（例如Basic和Java外观（金属））进行子类化和实现。此包仅由无法通过子类化现有外观组件（如 javax.swing.plaf.basic 和 javax.swing.plaf.metal 包提供的组件）来创建新外观的开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the stack trace information printed by printStackTrace().
trans-unit.target: 提供对通过 printStackTrace() 打印的堆栈跟踪信息的编程访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the stack trace information printed by printStackTrace(). Returns an array of stack trace elements, each representing one stack frame. The zeroth element of the array (assuming the array's length is non-zero) represents the top of the stack, which is the last method invocation in the sequence. Typically, this is the point at which this throwable was created and thrown. The last element of the array (assuming the array's length is non-zero) represents the bottom of the stack, which is the first method invocation in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 提供对通过 printStackTrace() 打印的堆栈跟踪信息的编程访问。返回一个堆栈跟踪元素数组，每个元素代表一个堆栈帧。数组的第零个元素（假设数组的长度为非零）表示堆栈的顶部，这是序列中的最后一个方法调用。通常，这是创建和抛出该throwable的地方。数组的最后一个元素（假设数组的长度为非零）表示堆栈的底部，这是序列中的第一个方法调用。

trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the stack trace information printed by printStackTrace(). Returns an array of stack trace elements, each representing one stack frame. The zeroth element of the array (assuming the array's length is non-zero) represents the top of the stack, which is the last method invocation in the sequence. Typically, this is the point at which this throwable was created and thrown. The last element of the array (assuming the array's length is non-zero) represents the bottom of the stack, which is the first method invocation in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 提供对 printStackTrace() 打印的堆栈跟踪信息的编程访问。返回一个堆栈跟踪元素数组，每个元素代表一个堆栈帧。数组的第零个元素（假设数组的长度为非零）表示堆栈的顶部，这是序列中的最后一个方法调用。通常，这是创建和抛出该throwable的地方。数组的最后一个元素（假设数组的长度为非零）表示堆栈的底部，这是序列中的第一个方法调用。

trans-unit.source: Provides reference-object classes, which support a limited degree of interaction with the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 提供参考对象类,支持与垃圾收集器进行有限程度的交互。

trans-unit.source: Provides reference-object classes, which support a limited degree of interaction with the garbage collector. A program may use a reference object to maintain a reference to some other object in such a way that the latter object may still be reclaimed by the collector. A program may also arrange to be notified some time after the collector has determined that the reachability of a given object has changed.
trans-unit.target: 提供参考对象类,支持与垃圾收集器进行有限程度的交互。一个程序可以使用一个引用对象来保持对其他一些对象的引用,这样后一个对象仍然可以被收集器回收。程序也可以安排在收集器确定某个对象的可到达性发生变化后的一段时间内得到通知。

trans-unit.source: Provides security-checked access to a MethodHandles.Lookup object.
trans-unit.target: 提供对 MethodHandles.Lookup 对象进行安全检查的访问。

trans-unit.source: Provides security-checked access to a MethodHandles.Lookup object. See getLookup() for details.
trans-unit.target: 提供对 MethodHandles.Lookup 对象进行安全检查的访问。有关详细信息，请参见 getLookup() 。

trans-unit.source: Provides services that allow Java programming language agents to instrument programs running on the JVM.
trans-unit.target: 提供服务,允许Java编程语言代理对运行在JVM上的程序进行检测。

trans-unit.source: Provides services that allow Java programming language agents to instrument programs running on the JVM. The mechanism for instrumentation is modification of the byte-codes of methods.
trans-unit.target: 提供服务,允许Java编程语言代理对运行在JVM上的程序进行仪器化。仪器化的机制是修改方法的字节码。

trans-unit.source: Provides simple implementations for most methods in JavaFileObject.
trans-unit.target: 为JavaFileObject中的大多数方法提供简单的实现。

trans-unit.source: Provides simple implementations for most methods in JavaFileObject. This class is designed to be subclassed and used as a basis for JavaFileObject implementations. Subclasses can override the implementation and specification of any method of this class as long as the general contract of JavaFileObject is obeyed.
trans-unit.target: 为 JavaFileObject 中的大多数方法提供简单的实现。这个类被设计成可以被子类化,并作为JavaFileObject实现的基础。只要遵守JavaFileObject的一般契约,子类可以覆盖这个类的任何方法的实现和规范。

trans-unit.source: Provides standard JavaBeans event notifications to registered event listeners. Refer to the documentation of javax.sql.RowSetEvent interface (available in the JDBC 3.0 specification) for more details on how to register and handle standard RowSet events generated by compliant implementations.
trans-unit.target: 向注册的事件侦听器提供标准的JavaBeans事件通知。有关如何注册和处理由兼容实现生成的标准RowSet事件的更多详细信息，请参考 javax.sql.RowSetEvent 接口的文档（在JDBC 3.0规范中可用）。

trans-unit.source: Provides standard JavaBeans property manipulation mechanisms to allow applications to get and set RowSet command and property values. Refer to the documentation of the javax.sql.RowSet interface (available in the JDBC 3.0 specification) for more details on the standard RowSet properties.
trans-unit.target: 提供标准的JavaBeans属性操纵机制，以允许应用程序获取和设置 RowSet 命令和属性值。有关标准 RowSet 属性的更多详细信息，请参考 javax.sql.RowSet 接口的文档（在JDBC 3.0规范中可用）。

trans-unit.source: Provides stream and URI specific transformation classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供流和URI特定的转换类。

trans-unit.source: Provides string constants that can be used to set output properties for a Transformer, or to retrieve output properties from a Transformer or Templates object.
trans-unit.target: 提供了字符串常量,可用于设置Transformer的输出属性,或从Transformer或Templates对象中检索输出属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides support for LDAPv3 extended operations and controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供对LDAPv3扩展操作和控制的支持。

trans-unit.source: Provides support for RMI Object Activation.
trans-unit.target: 提供对RMI对象激活的支持。

trans-unit.source: Provides support for RMI Object Activation. A remote object's reference can be made ``persistent'' and later activated into a ``live'' object using the RMI activation mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 为RMI对象激活提供支持。可将远程对象的引用变成 "持久 "对象,随后使用RMI激活机制将其激活为 "活 "对象。

trans-unit.source: Provides support for event notification when accessing naming and directory services.
trans-unit.target: 为访问命名和目录服务时的事件通知提供支持。

trans-unit.source: Provides the String representation of the control type.
trans-unit.target: 提供控件类型的 String 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Provides the String representation of the control type. This String is the same name that was passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 提供控件类型的 String 表示形式。此 String 与传递给构造函数的名称相同。

trans-unit.source: Provides the String representation of the encoding.
trans-unit.target: 提供编码的 String 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Provides the String representation of the encoding. This String is the same name that was passed to the constructor. For the predefined encodings, the name is similar to the encoding's variable (field) name. For example, PCM_SIGNED.toString() returns the name "PCM_SIGNED".
trans-unit.target: 提供编码的 String 表示形式。此 String 与传递给构造函数的名称相同。对于预定义的编码，名称类似于编码的变量（字段）名称。例如， PCM_SIGNED.toString() 返回名称“ PCM_SIGNED”。

trans-unit.source: Provides the String representation of the encoding. This String is the same name that was passed to the constructor. For the predefined encodings, the name is similar to the encoding's variable (field) name. For example, PCM_SIGNED.toString() returns the name "pcm_signed".
trans-unit.target: 提供编码的 String 表示形式。此 String 与传递给构造函数的名称相同。对于预定义的编码，名称类似于编码的变量（字段）名称。例如， PCM_SIGNED.toString() 返回名称“ pcm_signed”。

trans-unit.source: Provides the jshell tool for evaluating snippets of Java code, and defines a JDK-specific API for modeling and executing snippets. The JShell API supports Java Programming Language 'snippet' evaluating tools, such as Read-Eval-Print Loops (REPLs). Separate packages support building tools, configuring the execution of tools, and programmatically launching the existing Java shell tool.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于评估Java代码段的jshell工具，并定义了JDK特定的API，用于建模和执行代码段。JShell API支持Java编程语言“代码段”评估工具，例如Read-Eval-Print循环（REPL）。单独的软件包支持构建工具，配置工具的执行以及以编程方式启动现有的Java Shell工具。

trans-unit.source: Provides the jshell tool for evaluating snippets of Java code, and defines a JDK-specific API for modeling and executing snippets.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于评估Java代码段的jshell工具，并定义了JDK特定的API，用于建模和执行代码段。

trans-unit.source: Provides the API for accessing and processing data stored in a data source (usually a relational database) using the Java programming language.
trans-unit.target: 为使用Java编程语言访问和处理存储在数据源(通常是关系型数据库)中的数据提供API。

trans-unit.source: Provides the API for accessing and processing data stored in a data source (usually a relational database) using the Java programming language. This API includes a framework whereby different drivers can be installed dynamically to access different data sources. Although the JDBC API is mainly geared to passing SQL statements to a database, it provides for reading and writing data from any data source with a tabular format. The reader/writer facility, available through the javax.sql.RowSet group of interfaces, can be customized to use and update data from a spread sheet, flat file, or any other tabular data source.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于使用Java编程语言访问和处理存储在数据源（通常是关系数据库）中的数据的API。该API包括一个框架，通过该框架可以动态安装不同的驱动程序以访问不同的数据源。尽管JDBC API主要用于将SQL语句传递给数据库，但它可以从任何以表格格式的数据源中读取和写入数据。可以通过 javax.sql.RowSet 组接口提供的读取器/写入器功能可以进行自定义，以使用和更新电子表格，平面文件或任何其他表格数据源中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides the API for accessing and processing data stored in a data source (usually a relational database) using the Java™ programming language.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于使用Java™编程语言访问和处理存储在数据源（通常是关系数据库）中的数据的API。

trans-unit.source: Provides the API for accessing and processing data stored in a data source (usually a relational database) using the Java™ programming language. This API includes a framework whereby different drivers can be installed dynamically to access different data sources. Although the JDBC™ API is mainly geared to passing SQL statements to a database, it provides for reading and writing data from any data source with a tabular format. The reader/writer facility, available through the javax.sql.RowSet group of interfaces, can be customized to use and update data from a spread sheet, flat file, or any other tabular data source.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于使用Java™编程语言访问和处理存储在数据源（通常是关系数据库）中的数据的API。该API包括一个框架，通过该框架可以动态安装不同的驱动程序以访问不同的数据源。尽管JDBC™API主要用于将SQL语句传递给数据库，但它可以从任何以表格格式的数据源中读取和写入数据。可以通过 javax.sql.RowSet 组接口提供的读取器/写入器功能可以进行自定义，以使用和更新电子表格，平面文件或任何其他表格数据源中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides the API for server side data source access and processing from the Java programming language.
trans-unit.target: 为Java编程语言的服务器端数据源访问和处理提供API。

trans-unit.source: Provides the API for server side data source access and processing from the Java programming language. This package supplements the java.sql package and, as of the version 1.4 release, is included in the Java Platform, Standard Edition (Java SE). It remains an essential part of the Java Platform, Enterprise Edition (Java EE).
trans-unit.target: 提供用于从Java编程语言访问和处理服务器端数据源的API。该软件包是对 java.sql 软件包的补充，从1.4版开始，该软件包已包含在Java Platform Standard Edition（Java SE）中。它仍然是Java平台企业版（Java EE）的重要组成部分。

trans-unit.source: Provides the RMI package.
trans-unit.target: 提供RMI包。

trans-unit.source: Provides the RMI package. RMI is Remote Method Invocation. It is a mechanism that enables an object on one Java virtual machine to invoke methods on an object in another Java virtual machine. Any object that can be invoked this way must implement the Remote interface. When such an object is invoked, its arguments are ``marshalled'' and sent from the local virtual machine to the remote one, where the arguments are ``unmarshalled.'' When the method terminates, the results are marshalled from the remote machine and sent to the caller's virtual machine. If the method invocation results in an exception being thrown, the exception is indicated to caller.
trans-unit.target: 提供RMI包。RMI是远程方法调用。它是一种机制,使一个Java虚拟机上的对象能够调用另一个Java虚拟机上的对象的方法。任何可以通过这种方式调用的对象都必须实现Remote接口。当这样的对象被调用时,它的参数会被 "marshalled",并从本地虚拟机发送到远程虚拟机,而在远程虚拟机上的参数则被 "unmarshalled"。当方法终止时,其结果从远程机器上被marshalled,并被发送到调用者的虚拟机上。如果方法调用导致抛出异常,则向调用者说明异常。

trans-unit.source: Provides the classes and interfaces for cryptographic operations. The cryptographic operations defined in this package include encryption, key generation and key agreement, and Message Authentication Code (MAC) generation.

trans-unit.source: Provides the classes and interfaces for the security framework.
trans-unit.target: 提供安全框架的类和接口。

trans-unit.source: Provides the classes and interfaces for the security framework. This includes classes that implement an easily configurable, fine-grained access control security architecture. This package also supports the generation and storage of cryptographic public key pairs, as well as a number of exportable cryptographic operations including those for message digest and signature generation. Finally, this package provides classes that support signed/guarded objects and secure random number generation. Many of the classes provided in this package (the cryptographic and secure random number generator classes in particular) are provider-based. The class itself defines a programming interface to which applications may write. The implementations themselves may then be written by independent third-party vendors and plugged in seamlessly as needed. Therefore application developers may take advantage of any number of provider-based implementations without having to add or rewrite code.
trans-unit.target: 为安全框架提供类和接口。其中包括实现易于配置的细粒度访问控制安全架构的类。该包还支持加密公钥对的生成和存储,以及一些可导出的加密操作,包括用于消息摘要和签名生成的操作。最后,这个包提供了支持签名/守护对象和安全随机数生成的类。这个包中提供的许多类(特别是加密和安全随机数生成器类)是基于提供者的。类本身定义了一个编程接口,应用程序可以写到这个接口。然后,实现本身可以由独立的第三方供应商编写,并根据需要无缝插入。因此,应用程序开发人员可以利用任何数量的基于提供者的实现,而无需添加或重写代码。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the ModelMBean classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供ModelMBean类的定义。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the ModelMBean classes. A Model MBean is an MBean that acts as a bridge between the management interface and the underlying managed resource. Both the management interface and the managed resource are specified as Java objects. The same Model MBean implementation can be reused many times with different management interfaces and managed resources, and it can provide common functionality such as persistence and caching.
trans-unit.target: 提供ModelMBean类的定义。模型MBean是作为管理接口和底层管理资源之间的桥梁的MBean。管理接口和管理资源都被指定为Java对象。同一个Model MBean实现可以多次重复使用不同的管理接口和管理资源,它可以提供持久化和缓存等通用功能。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the Relation Service.
trans-unit.target: 提供关系服务的定义。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the Relation Service. The Relation Service is used to record relationships between MBeans in an MBean Server. The Relation Service is itself an MBean. More than one instance of a RelationService MBean can be registered in an MBean Server.
trans-unit.target: 提供关系服务的定义。Relation Service用于记录MBean服务器中MBean之间的关系。关系服务本身就是一个MBean。可以在MBean服务器中注册多个 RelationService MBean 实例。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the Timer MBean.
trans-unit.target: 提供定时器MBean的定义。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the Timer MBean. A Timer MBean maintains a list of scheduled notifications and, because it is a NotificationBroadcaster, a list of listeners for those notifications. Whenever the time for one of the scheduled notifications is reached, each listener receives the notification. Notifications can be repeated at a fixed interval, and the number of repetitions can be bounded.
trans-unit.target: 提供Timer MBean的定义。计时器MBean维护计划的通知列表，并且由于它是 NotificationBroadcaster ，因此维护这些通知的侦听器列表。每当到达计划的通知之一的时间时，每个侦听器都会收到该通知。通知可以以固定的间隔重复，并且重复的次数可以限制。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the monitor classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供监控类的定义。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the monitor classes. A Monitor is an MBean that periodically observes the value of an attribute in one or more other MBeans. If the attribute meets a certain condition, the Monitor emits a MonitorNotification. When the monitor MBean periodically calls getAttribute to retrieve the value of the attribute being monitored it does so within the access control context of the Monitor.start() caller.
trans-unit.target: 提供监视器类的定义。Monitor是一个MBean，它定期观察一个或多个其他MBean中的属性值。如果属性满足特定条件，则Monitor会发出 MonitorNotification 。当监视器MBean定期调用 getAttribute 来检索要监视的属性的值时，它会在 Monitor.start() 调用者的访问控制上下文中进行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of the monitor classes. A Monitor is an MBean that periodically observes the value of an attribute in one or more other MBeans. If the attribute meets a certain condition, the Monitor emits a MonitorNotification. When the monitor MBean periodically calls getAttribute to retrieve the value of the attribute being monitored it does so within the access control context of the Monitor.start() caller.
trans-unit.target: 提供监视器类的定义。Monitor是一个MBean，它定期观察一个或多个其他MBean中的属性值。如果属性满足特定条件，则Monitor会发出 MonitorNotification 。当监视器MBean定期调用 getAttribute 来检索要监视的属性的值时，它会在 Monitor.start() 调用者的访问控制上下文中这样做。

trans-unit.source: Provides the implementation for RMIClassLoader.loadClass(URL,String), RMIClassLoader.loadClass(String,String), and RMIClassLoader.loadClass(String,String,ClassLoader). Loads a class from a codebase URL path, optionally using the supplied loader. Typically, a provider implementation will attempt to resolve the named class using the given defaultLoader, if specified, before attempting to resolve the class from the codebase URL path.
trans-unit.target: 提供 RMIClassLoader.loadClass(URL,String) ， RMIClassLoader.loadClass(String,String) 和 RMIClassLoader.loadClass(String,String,ClassLoader) 的实现。从代码库URL路径中加载类，可以选择使用提供的加载器来加载。通常，提供程序实现会尝试使用给定的 defaultLoader （如果已指定）来解析命名的类，然后再尝试从代码库URL路径解析该类。

An Open MBean is an MBean where the types of attributes and of operation parameters and return values are built using a small set of predefined Java classes. Open MBeans facilitate operation with remote management programs that do not necessarily have access to application-specific types, including non-Java programs.

trans-unit.source: Provides user interface objects that combine two or more look and feels. When a component asks for its UI, this look and feel returns a multiplexing UI that handles all communications with both the default look and feel and one or more auxiliary look and feels. For example, if a user combines an auxiliary audio look and feel with the Motif look and feel, the JButton.getUI method would return an instance of MultiButtonUI, which would handle both a MotifButtonUI and an AudioButtonUI.
trans-unit.target: 提供结合了两个或多个外观的用户界面对象。当组件要求其UI时，此外观会返回一个多路复用UI，该UI处理所有通信时都具有默认外观和一个或多个辅助外观。例如，如果用户将辅助音频外观与Motif外观结合在一起，则 JButton.getUI 方法将返回 MultiButtonUI 的实例，该实例将同时处理 MotifButtonUI 和 AudioButtonUI 。

trans-unit.source: Proxy classes are non-public, final, and not abstract if any of the proxy interfaces is non-public.

trans-unit.source: Proxy classes are public, final, and not abstract if all proxy interfaces are public.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有代理接口都是公共的，则代理类是公共的，最终的，而不是抽象的。

trans-unit.source: Proxy classes generated in a named module are encapsulated and not accessible to code outside its module.
trans-unit.target: 在命名模块中生成的代理类被封装,不能被模块外的代码访问。

trans-unit.source: Proxy classes generated in a named module are encapsulated and not accessible to code outside its module. Constructor.newInstance will throw IllegalAccessException when it is called on an inaccessible proxy class. Use newProxyInstance(ClassLoader, Class[], InvocationHandler) to create a proxy instance instead.
trans-unit.target: 在命名模块中生成的代理类被封装，并且其模块外部的代码无法访问。在无法访问的代理类上调用 Constructor.newInstance 时,它将抛出 IllegalAccessException 。改用 newProxyInstance(ClassLoader, Class[], InvocationHandler) 创建代理实例。

trans-unit.source: Publication methods support different policies about what to do when buffers are saturated. Method submit blocks until resources are available. This is simplest, but least responsive. The offer methods may drop items (either immediately or with bounded timeout), but provide an opportunity to interpose a handler and then retry.
trans-unit.target: 发布方法支持有关缓冲区饱和时如何处理的不同策略。方法 submit 块，直到资源可用。这是最简单的方法，但响应速度较慢。该 offer 的方法可以掉落物品（立即或有界超时），但提供了一个机会干预处理程序，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: Publish a LogRecord.
trans-unit.target: 发布一个 LogRecord 。

trans-unit.source: Publish the changes in preferences upward to the parent view.
trans-unit.target: 将偏好的变化向上发布到父视图中。

trans-unit.source: Publish the changes in preferences upward to the parent view. This is normally called by the layout thread.
trans-unit.target: 向上发布偏好设置的变化到父视图。这通常由布局线程调用。

trans-unit.source: Publishers may vary in policy about whether drops (failures to issue an item because of resource limitations) are treated as unrecoverable errors. Publishers may also vary about whether Subscribers receive items that were produced or available before they subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 出版商在政策上可能会有不同的规定,如是否将掉线(由于资源限制而无法发行项目)作为不可恢复的错误处理。出版商也可能会对订阅者是否会收到在他们订阅之前就已经制作好的或可以使用的物品而采取不同的政策。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the given item to each current subscriber by asynchronously invoking its onNext method, blocking uninterruptibly while resources for any subscriber are unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 通过异步调用给定项目的 onNext 方法，将给定项目发布到每个当前订户，当任何订户的资源不可用时，不间断地进行阻止。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the given item to each current subscriber by asynchronously invoking its onNext method, blocking uninterruptibly while resources for any subscriber are unavailable. This method returns an estimate of the maximum lag (number of items submitted but not yet consumed) among all current subscribers. This value is at least one (accounting for this submitted item) if there are any subscribers, else zero.
trans-unit.target: 通过异步调用给定项目的 onNext 方法，将给定项目发布到每个当前订户，当任何订户的资源不可用时，不间断地进行阻止。此方法返回所有当前订户中的最大滞后时间（已提交但尚未消耗的项目数）的估计值。如果有任何订阅者，则此值至少为一个（计入此提交的项目），否则为零。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the given item, if possible, to each current subscriber by asynchronously invoking its onNext method, blocking while resources for any subscription are unavailable, up to the specified timeout or until the caller thread is interrupted, at which point the given handler (if non-null) is invoked, and if it returns true, retried once.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，通过异步调用其 onNext 方法将给定项目发布到每个当前订阅者，在任何订阅资源不可用时阻止，直到指定的超时或直到调用者线程被中断为止，此时给定的处理程序（如果非-null）被调用，如果返回true，则重试一次。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the given item, if possible, to each current subscriber by asynchronously invoking its onNext method, blocking while resources for any subscription are unavailable, up to the specified timeout or until the caller thread is interrupted, at which point the given handler (if non-null) is invoked, and if it returns true, retried once. (The drop handler may distinguish timeouts from interrupts by checking whether the current thread is interrupted.) Other calls to methods in this class by other threads are blocked while the handler is invoked. Unless recovery is assured, options are usually limited to logging the error and/or issuing an onError signal to the subscriber.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，通过异步调用其 onNext 方法将给定项目发布到每个当前订阅者，在任何订阅资源不可用时阻止，直到指定的超时或直到调用者线程被中断为止，此时给定的处理程序（如果非-null）被调用，如果返回true，则重试一次。（删除处理程序可以通过检查当前线程是否被中断来区分超时与中断。）在调用处理程序时，其他线程对该类中方法的其他调用将被阻止。除非确保恢复，否则选项通常仅限于记录错误和/或向用户发出 onError 信号。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the given item, if possible, to each current subscriber by asynchronously invoking its onNext method.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，通过异步调用其 onNext 方法将给定项目发布到每个当前订户。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the given item, if possible, to each current subscriber by asynchronously invoking its onNext method. The item may be dropped by one or more subscribers if resource limits are exceeded, in which case the given handler (if non-null) is invoked, and if it returns true, retried once. Other calls to methods in this class by other threads are blocked while the handler is invoked. Unless recovery is assured, options are usually limited to logging the error and/or issuing an onError signal to the subscriber.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，通过异步调用其 onNext 方法将给定项目发布到每个当前订户。如果超出资源限制，则一个或多个订阅者可能会丢弃该项目，在这种情况下，将调用给定的处理程序（如果为非null），并且如果返回true，则重试一次。调用处理程序时，其他线程对该类中方法的其他调用将被阻止。除非确保恢复，否则选项通常仅限于记录错误和/或向用户发出 onError 信号。

trans-unit.source: Pushes an element onto the stack represented by this deque (in other words, at the head of this deque) if it is possible to do so immediately without violating capacity restrictions, throwing an IllegalStateException if no space is currently available.

trans-unit.source: Pushes an element onto the stack represented by this deque.

trans-unit.source: Pushes an element onto the stack represented by this deque. In other words, inserts the element at the front of this deque.
trans-unit.target: 将一个元素推到这个deque所代表的堆栈中。换句话说,将元素插入到这个deque的前面。

trans-unit.source: Pushes an element onto the stack represented by this list.

trans-unit.source: Pushes an item onto the top of this stack. This has exactly the same effect as:
trans-unit.target: 将一个物品推到这个堆栈的顶部。这与以下的效果完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back a byte by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 通过复制一个字节到推回缓冲区的前面,将其推回。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back a byte by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer. After this method returns, the next byte to be read will have the value (byte)b.
trans-unit.target: 通过将字节复制到推回缓冲区的前面来推回字节。此方法返回后，下一个要读取的字节将具有值 (byte)b 。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back a portion of an array of bytes by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 将数组中的一部分字节复制到推回缓冲区的前面,从而推回。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back a portion of an array of bytes by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer. After this method returns, the next byte to be read will have the value b[off], the byte after that will have the value b[off+1], and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 通过将字节数组的一部分复制到推回缓冲区的前面来推回该数组。此方法返回后，下一个要读取的字节将具有值 b[off] ，其后的字节将具有值 b[off+1] ，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back a portion of an array of characters by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 将一个数组中的部分字符复制到推回缓冲区的前面,从而将其推回。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back a portion of an array of characters by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer. After this method returns, the next character to be read will have the value cbuf[off], the character after that will have the value cbuf[off+1], and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 通过将字符数组的一部分复制到推回缓冲区的前面来推回一部分字符。此方法返回后，下一个要读取的字符将具有值 cbuf[off] ，此后的字符将具有值 cbuf[off+1] ，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back a single character by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 通过将单个字符复制到推回缓冲区的前面,将其推回。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back a single character by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer. After this method returns, the next character to be read will have the value (char)c.
trans-unit.target: 通过将单个字符复制到推回缓冲区的前面来推回单个字符。返回此方法后，下一个要读取的字符将具有 (char)c 值。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back an array of bytes by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 通过将一个数组复制到回推缓冲区的前面,将其回推。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back an array of bytes by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer. After this method returns, the next byte to be read will have the value b[0], the byte after that will have the value b[1], and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 通过将字节数组复制到推回缓冲区的前面来推回它。此方法返回后，下一个要读取的字节将具有值 b[0] ，其后的字节将具有值 b[1] ，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back an array of characters by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 通过将字符数组复制到推回缓冲区的前面,将其推回。

trans-unit.source: Pushes back an array of characters by copying it to the front of the pushback buffer. After this method returns, the next character to be read will have the value cbuf[0], the character after that will have the value cbuf[1], and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 通过将字符数组复制到推回缓冲区的前面来推回它。返回此方法后，下一个要读取的字符将具有值 cbuf[0] ，此后的字符将具有值 cbuf[1] ，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Puts all Text nodes in the full depth of the sub-tree underneath this Node, including attribute nodes, into a "normal" form where only structure (e.g., elements, comments, processing instructions, CDATA sections, and entity references) separates Text nodes, i.e., there are neither adjacent Text nodes nor empty Text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 将所有 Text 节点（包括属性节点）放置在此 Node 之下的子树的整个深度中，包括属性节点，以“常规”形式，其中仅结构（例如，元素，注释，处理指令，CDATA部分和实体引用）分隔 Text 节点，即，没有相邻的 Text 节点，也没有空的 Text 节点。

trans-unit.source: Puts all Text nodes in the full depth of the sub-tree underneath this Node, including attribute nodes, into a "normal" form where only structure (e.g., elements, comments, processing instructions, CDATA sections, and entity references) separates Text nodes, i.e., there are neither adjacent Text nodes nor empty Text nodes. This can be used to ensure that the DOM view of a document is the same as if it were saved and re-loaded, and is useful when operations (such as XPointer [XPointer] lookups) that depend on a particular document tree structure are to be used. If the parameter "normalize-characters" of the DOMConfiguration object attached to the Node.ownerDocument is true, this method will also fully normalize the characters of the Text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 将所有 Text 节点（包括属性节点）放置在此 Node 之下的子树的整个深度中，包括属性节点，以“常规”形式，其中仅结构（例如，元素，注释，处理指令，CDATA部分和实体引用）分隔 Text 节点，即，没有相邻的 Text 节点，也没有空的 Text 节点。这可以用来确保文档的DOM视图与保存并重新加载该文档的DOM视图相同，并且在依赖于特定文档树结构的操作（例如XPointer [ XPointer ]查找）用于使用。如果 DOMConfiguration 对象的参数“ normalize-characters”附加到 Node.ownerDocument 为 true ，此方法还将完全规范化 Text 节点的字符。

trans-unit.source: Puts all Text nodes in the full depth of the sub-tree underneath this Node, including attribute nodes, into a "normal" form where only structure (e.g., elements, comments, processing instructions, CDATA sections, and entity references) separates Text nodes, i.e., there are neither adjacent Text nodes nor empty Text nodes. This can be used to ensure that the DOM view of a document is the same as if it were saved and re-loaded, and is useful when operations (such as XPointer [XPointer] lookups) that depend on a particular document tree structure are to be used. If the parameter "normalize-characters" of the DOMConfiguration object attached to the Node.ownerDocument is true, this method will also fully normalize the characters of the Text nodes.

trans-unit.source: Queries are a key tool for extracting information from date-times. They exists to externalize the process of querying, permitting different approaches, as per the strategy design pattern. Examples might be a query that checks if the date is the day before February 29th in a leap year, or calculates the number of days to your next birthday.
trans-unit.target: 查询是从数据时间中提取信息的一个关键工具,它的存在是为了将查询过程外部化,允许按照策略设计模式采取不同的方法。它们的存在是为了将查询的过程外部化,允许按照策略设计模式采用不同的方法。例如,查询可以检查日期是否是闰年2月29日的前一天,或者计算距离下一个生日的天数。

trans-unit.source: Queries are a key tool for extracting information from temporal objects. They exist to externalize the process of querying, permitting different approaches, as per the strategy design pattern. Examples might be a query that checks if the date is the day before February 29th in a leap year, or calculates the number of days to your next birthday.
trans-unit.target: 查询是从时间对象中提取信息的关键工具。它们的存在是为了将查询的过程外部化,允许按照策略设计模式采用不同的方法。例子可能是一个查询,检查日期是否是闰年2月29日的前一天,或者计算距离你下一个生日的天数。

trans-unit.source: Queries if this write lock is held by the current thread. Identical in effect to ReentrantReadWriteLock.isWriteLockedByCurrentThread().
trans-unit.target: 查询此写锁是否由当前线程持有。与 ReentrantReadWriteLock.isWriteLockedByCurrentThread() 相同。

trans-unit.source: Queries if this write lock is held by the current thread. Identical in effect to ReentrantReadWriteLock.isWriteLockedByCurrentThread().
trans-unit.target: 查询此写锁定是否由当前线程持有。与 ReentrantReadWriteLock.isWriteLockedByCurrentThread() 相同。

trans-unit.source: Queries may be done on the Snippet object. The Snippet.id() will be "*UNASSOCIATED*". The returned snippets are not associated with the JShell instance, so attempts to pass them to JShell methods will throw an IllegalArgumentException. They will not appear in queries for snippets -- for example, JShell.snippets().
trans-unit.target: 可以在 Snippet 对象上进行查询。该 Snippet.id() 将 "*UNASSOCIATED*" 。返回的代码段与 JShell 实例无关，因此尝试将其传递给 JShell 方法将抛出 IllegalArgumentException 。它们不会出现在片段查询中，例如 JShell.snippets() 。

trans-unit.source: Queries the number of holds on this write lock by the current thread. A thread has a hold on a lock for each lock action that is not matched by an unlock action. Identical in effect to ReentrantReadWriteLock.getWriteHoldCount().
trans-unit.target: 查询当前线程对该写锁的保留数。对于每个未通过解锁动作匹配的锁定动作，线程都会拥有一个锁。与 ReentrantReadWriteLock.getWriteHoldCount() 相同。

trans-unit.source: Queries the number of holds on this write lock by the current thread. A thread has a hold on a lock for each lock action that is not matched by an unlock action. Identical in effect to ReentrantReadWriteLock.getWriteHoldCount().
trans-unit.target: 查询当前线程对该写锁的保留数。对于每个未与解锁动作匹配的锁定动作，线程都会拥有一个锁。与 ReentrantReadWriteLock.getWriteHoldCount() 相同。

trans-unit.source: Queries the number of read locks held for this lock.

trans-unit.source: Queries the number of read locks held for this lock. This method is designed for use in monitoring system state, not for synchronization control.
trans-unit.target: 查询该锁所持有的读锁数量。该方法用于监控系统状态,而不是用于同步控制。

trans-unit.source: Queries the number of reentrant read holds on this lock by the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 查询当前线程在该锁上的重入读保持次数。

trans-unit.source: Queries the number of reentrant read holds on this lock by the current thread. A reader thread has a hold on a lock for each lock action that is not matched by an unlock action.
trans-unit.target: 查询当前线程对该锁的重入读取保持数。读取线程对每一个锁的解锁操作都有一个保持,但没有与之匹配的解锁操作。

trans-unit.source: Queries the number of reentrant write holds on this lock by the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 查询当前线程对该锁的重入写保持次数。

trans-unit.source: Queries the number of reentrant write holds on this lock by the current thread. A writer thread has a hold on a lock for each lock action that is not matched by an unlock action.
trans-unit.target: 查询当前线程对该锁的重入写保持次数。写入线程对每一个锁的解锁操作都有一个保持,但没有与之匹配的解锁操作。
